text: FC Stratford is a football club based in Stratford upon Avon, Warwickshire, England. They are currently members of the and play at Knights Lane, groundsharing with Stratford Town. ==History== The club was founded in 2007 as Stratford Town A, joining the Midland Football Combination in 2009. In 2011, the club changed name to FC Stratford. FC Stratford entered the FA Vase for the first time in 2018–19. ==Ground== The club currently groundshare with Stratford Town at Knights Lane in Tiddington. ==Records== *Best FA Vase performance: First qualifying round, 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Association football clubs established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in England Category:Football clubs in England Category:Football clubs in Warwickshire Category:Stratford-upon-Avon Category:Midland Football Alliance Category:Midland Football Combination
title: FC Stratford
